real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[free] Discard Beat Cop: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: First Aid
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.

real_text:
Uses (3 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage or horror from an investigator at your location.

name: Machete
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If the attacked enemy is the only enemy engaged with you, this attack deals +1 damage.
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If the attacked enemy is the only enemy engaged with you, this attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: Cuts through vines, underbrush, and tentacles equally well.

name: Guard Dog
text: [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.
real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.
flavor: Fiercely loyal, these trained canines make for perfect companions.

name: Evidence!
text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Discover 1 clue at your location.
real_text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Discover 1 clue at your location.
flavor: Just as I suspected!

name: Dodge
text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack.
real_text:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack.

name: Dynamite Blast
text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location.
real_text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location.

name: Vicious Blow
text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.
real_text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.
flavor: With a sickening smack, he struck the abomination over and over... until at last, it stopped moving.

name: Extra Ammunition
text: Place 3 ammo tokens on a [[Firearm]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
real_text: Place 3 ammo tokens on a [[Firearm]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
flavor: I've never met a beast that could outsmart a bullet.

name: Police Badge
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[free] While an investigator at your location is taking his or her turn, discard Police Badge: That investigator may take 2 additional actions this turn.
real_text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[free] While an investigator at your location is taking his or her turn, discard Police Badge: That investigator may take 2 additional actions this turn.

text:
You get +1 [combat].
[free] Exhaust Beat Cop and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
real_text:
You get +1 [combat].
[free] Exhaust Beat Cop and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Shotgun
text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5).
real_text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5).

name: Magnifying Glass
text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
real_text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
flavor: A lens into a world unseen can reveal things you wish it hadn't.

name: Old Book of Lore
text: [action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles the remaining cards into his or her deck.
real_text: [action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles the remaining cards into his or her deck.

name: Research Librarian
text: [reaction] After Research Librarian enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tome]] asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
real_text: [reaction] After Research Librarian enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tome]] asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "There have been problems at the Orne Library, as we both know, given poor Armitage's condition, and the other, unrelated... incident of a few years ago..."

name: Dr. Milan Christopher
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you successfully investigate: Gain 1 resource.
real_text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you successfully investigate: Gain 1 resource.
flavor: "While I truly believe that this nightmare is just a singular abomination, I must admit that I am exhilarated by the possibility that this is but one specimen of a new genus!"

name: Hyperawareness
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

real_text: [action] Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 damage from that investigator. If you fail, deal 1 damage to that investigator.

name: Mind over Matter
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of the round, you may use your [intellect] in place of your [combat] and [agility].
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Until the end of the round, you may use your [intellect] in place of your [combat] and [agility].

Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discover 1 clue at your location.
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Barricade

real_text: Attach to your location. Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot move into attached location. Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.

name: Deduction
text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
real_text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.
flavor: I knew I had seen this symbol before. I must warn the others before it is too late!

name: Magnifying Glass
text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.
[free] If there are no clues on your location: Return Magnifying Glass to your hand.
real_text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.

name: Disc of Itzamna
text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Discard that enemy.
real_text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Discard that enemy.
flavor: Do they fear it because of what it will do to them? Or, do they fear it because of what it will do to you?

name: Encyclopedia
text: [action] Exhaust Encyclopedia: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.
real_text: [action] Exhaust Encyclopedia: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.
flavor: It's supposed to be comprehensive, but the more I search through its pages, the more I realize we know nothing about the real truths of the cosmos.

text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

real_text:

real_text: Fast. [action]: Fight. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.

real_text: [action] Exhaust Burglary: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, gain 3 resources.

real_text: [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Pickpocketing: Draw 1 card.

real_text: Forced - After Arcane Initiate enters play: Place 1 doom on it. [free] Exhaust Arcane Initiate: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a [[Spell]] card and draw it. Shuffle your deck.

text: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, discover 2 clues at your location.
real_text: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, discover 2 clues at your location.
flavor: "We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far." <cite>H. P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"</cite>

name: Ward of Protection
text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.

real_text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.

text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn.
real_text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn.

name: Fearless
text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror.
real_text: If this skill test is successful, heal 1 horror.

text:

real_text:

real_text: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to the enemy just evaded. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 action this turn and take 1 horror.

real_text:

Uses (4 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.

real_text:
Uses (4 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 1 of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.

name: Leather Coat
flavor: The coat was not the most fashionable choice, but it did feel warm and reassuring in its bulk.

name: Scavenging
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate by 2 or more, exhaust Scavenging: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.
real_text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate by 2 or more, exhaust Scavenging: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Baseball Bat
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If a [skull] or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, discard Baseball Bat after the attack resolves.
real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If a [skull] or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, discard Baseball Bat after the attack resolves.

name: Rabbit's Foot
text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
real_text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
flavor: They claimed it would bring me good luck. I wouldn't say that's true. But now I feel like it would be even worse luck to get rid of it.

name: Stray Cat
text: [free] Discard Stray Cat: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
real_text: [free] Discard Stray Cat: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
flavor: He never came if you called for him. It always seemed like he had his own agenda.

name: Dig Deep
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: Cunning Distraction
text: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies at your location.
real_text: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies at your location.
flavor: That should buy us some time.

Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.

real_text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 clues in your location.

text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.

real_text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.
Get +2 to your skill value for that test.

real_text: If this skill test is successful during an evasion attempt, the evading investigator may immediately disengage from each other enemy engaged with him or her, and may move to a connecting location.

name: Aquinnah

real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to another enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
flavor: "Do not be frightened by what you see. Be frightened by what you cannot see."

text:
Fast. Play after a non-weakness, non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is evaded.

real_text:
Fast. Play after a non-weakness, non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location is evaded.

Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.

real_text:
Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test.

real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.

real_text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. [action] Discard Knife: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation.

name: Emergency Cache
text: Gain 3 resources.
real_text: Gain 3 resources.
flavor: You can never be too prepared.

name: Guts
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Stay back! I'll handle this.

name: Perception
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: At last, I've found it!

name: Overpower
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Die, you beast!

name: Manual Dexterity
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
flavor: Too easy.

name: Unexpected Courage
text: Max 1 committed per skill test.
real_text: Max 1 committed per skill test.
flavor: Sometimes, the most selfless acts can come from the strangest places

name: Bulletproof Vest
flavor: Bullets are one thing... twelve-inch fangs quite another.

name: Elder Sign Amulet
flavor: This has been in my family for generations. Take care of it, and it will take care of you.

name: Amnesia
text: Revelation - Choose and discard all but 1 card from your hand.
real_text: Revelation - Choose and discard all but 1 card from your hand.
flavor: Wait... where am I? What was I doing?

name: Paranoia
text: Revelation - Discard all your resources.
real_text: Revelation - Discard all your resources.
flavor: What was that noise?

name: Haunted
text: Revelation - Add Haunted to your threat area. You get -1 to each of your skills. [action] [action]: Discard Haunted.
real_text: Revelation - Add Haunted to your threat area. You get -1 to each of your skills. [action] [action]: Discard Haunted.

name: Psychosis
text: Revelation - Add Psychosis to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more horror: Take 1 direct damage. [action] [action]: Discard Psychosis.
real_text: Revelation - Add Psychosis to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more horror: Take 1 direct damage. [action] [action]: Discard Psychosis.

name: Hypochondria
text: Revelation - Add Hypochondria to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Take 1 direct horror. [action] [action]: Discard Hypochondria.
real_text: Revelation - Add Hypochondria to your threat area. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Take 1 direct horror. [action] [action]: Discard Hypochondria.

name: Mob Enforcer
text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. [action] Spend 4 resources: Parley. Discard Mob Enforcer.
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. [action] Spend 4 resources: Parley. Discard Mob Enforcer.
flavor: You knew you shouldn't have borrowed money from the O'Bannion gang. It seems like they're always looking to collect at the worst times.

name: Silver Twilight Acolyte
text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. Forced - After Silver Twilight Acolyte attacks: Place 1 doom on the current agenda.
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. Forced - After Silver Twilight Acolyte attacks: Place 1 doom on the current agenda.
flavor: You'll never forget the day you learned the true secret of the Silver Twilight Lodge's inner circle. The truth is too terrible for the Lodge to let you live.

name: Stubborn Detective
text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. While Stubborn Detective is at your location, treat your investigator as if his or her printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
real_text: Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. While Stubborn Detective is at your location, treat your investigator as if his or her printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
flavor: Despite everything, he still won't believe you had nothing to do with those murders.

name: First Aid
text:
Uses (4 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset in your location.
real_text:
Uses (4 supplies). If First Aid has no supplies, discard it.
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset in your location.

name: "I've had worse…"
text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 5 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Then, gain that many resources.
real_text:
Fast. Play when you are dealt damage and/or horror.
Cancel up to 5 damage and/or horror just dealt to you. Then, gain that many resources.

name: Seeking Answers
text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
real_text: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
flavor: Some people need to know the truth at any cost. Some truths can cut like knives.

name: Old Book of Lore
text:
Uses (2 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of their deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles their deck. Then, you may spend 1 secret to have that investigator immediately play that card, reducing its cost by 2.
real_text:
Uses (2 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of their deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles their deck. Then, you may spend 1 secret to have that investigator immediately play that card, reducing its cost by 2.

name: Lockpicks
text: Uses (3 supplies). If Lockpicks has no supplies, discard it. [action] Exhaust Lockpicks: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 supply from Lockpicks.
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). If Lockpicks has no supplies, discard it. [action] Exhaust Lockpicks: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 supply from Lockpicks.

name: .41 Derringer
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Once per turn, if you succeed by 3 or more, you may take an additional action this turn.
real_text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Once per turn, if you succeed by 3 or more, you may take an additional action this turn.

name: Rite of Seeking
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.

name: Scrying
text:
Uses (3 charges).
[free] Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck, or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck, in any order. If a [[Terror]] or [[Omen]] card is among the looked-at cards, take 1 horror.
real_text:
Uses (3 charges).
[free] Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck, or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck, in any order. If a [[Terror]] or [[Omen]] card is among the looked-at cards, take 1 horror.

name: Aquinnah
text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to any enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
real_text: [reaction] When an enemy attacks you, exhaust Aquinnah and deal 1 horror to her: Deal that enemy's damage to any enemy at your location, instead. (You still take horror dealt by the attack.)
flavor:
"Do not be frightened by what you see.
Be frightened by what you cannot see."

name: Eucatastrophe
text:
Fast. Play when you reveal a chaos token that would reduce your skill value to 0 during a skill test (including the [auto_fail] token).
Cancel that token and treat it as an [elder_sign] token, instead.
real_text:
Fast. Play when you reveal a chaos token that would reduce your skill value to 0 during a skill test (including the [auto_fail] token).
Cancel that token and treat it as an [elder_sign] token, instead.

name: Emergency Cache
text: Gain 3 resources and draw 1 card.
real_text: Gain 3 resources and draw 1 card.
flavor: You can never be too prepared.

name: Charisma
text:
Permanent.
You have 1 additional ally slot.
real_text:
Permanent.
You have 1 additional ally slot.
